```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

First we load the libraries we need:
```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
library(DataExplorer)
```

# Loading the clean PBS survey data
We load the clean data:
```{r message=FALSE}
pbs <- read_csv("data_clean.csv")
```

Here is a clickable interface for searching, sorting, and viewing the clean data:
```{r}
#datatable(pbs[1:100,])
pbs %>%
    create_report(
        output_file = paste("Report", format(Sys.time(), "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z"), sep=" - "),
        report_title = "EDA Report - PBS Dataset"
    )
```
